 2023-06242023-06-22JUS
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisReappointment of SHELLY A. MARTIN of Fall River, Nova Scotia, as a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Province of Nova Scotia, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
